english.segment1: I waited for you today. But you didn't show. No no. I needed you today. So where did you go?. You told me to call. Said you'd be there. And though I haven't seen you. Are you still there?
english.segment2: Chorus. I cried out with no reply. And I can't feel you by my side. So I'll hold tight to what I know. You're here and I'm never alone
english.segment3: And though I cannot see you. And I can't explain why. Such a deep reassurance. You've placed in my life. We cannot separate. 'Cause you're part of me. And though you're invisible. I'll trust the unseen.
